pull_request.title: Fix for Issue 740 and some CMake refactoring
pull_request.body: When `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE` is explicitly set to `Release`, CMake adds `-DNDEBUG` to the build flags, which turns an `assert` into a no-op, which leads to the build failures in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/issues/740

pull_request.title: Fix for Issue 740 and some CMake refactoring
pull_request.body: When `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE` is explicitly set to `Release`, CMake adds `-DNDEBUG` to the build flags, which turns an `assert` into a no-op, which leads to the build failures in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/issues/740
